content:
Cross posting here since I have not seen a response on the bulk data stream:
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179250-bulk-data/topic/Bulk.20lab.20results.20for.20adult.20and.20dependent.20minor

I want to send bulk COVID-19 laboratory results for adults, but also include results for minors/dependents the adult is legally responsible for. How do I do that using bulk data - RelatedPerson resource? Thanks.
